pageContext.claim: “Breaking News: The President of Ukraine has just again announced that President Trump has done nothing wrong with respect to Ukraine and our interactions or calls. If the Radical Left Democrats were sane, which they are not, it would be case over!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is mischaracterizing remarks that President Volodymyr Zelensky said in an interview with Time magazine. Nowhere in the interview did Zelensky say that his American counterpart did “nothing wrong.” In fact, he criticized Trump’s comments about corruption in Ukraine and his decision to suspend military aid to Kyiv. Zelensky also questioned Trump's decision to freeze military aid, casting it as a matter of “fairness.”
